author: Jaimie Etkin
title: You Will Not Be The Same After Seeing Joseph Fiennes As Michael Jackson
text:
‚ÄúThe decision with the casting and the producers ‚Äî I wrangled with it, I was confused and shocked at what might come my way, and I knew the sensitivity, especially to Michael‚Äôs fans and to Michael‚Äôs family,‚Äù he told The Hollywood Reporter . ‚ÄúThis is quite right, why people are up in arms. I‚Äôm a full believer in making the playing field fair. When it is fair, we can have a conversation about this project and it wouldn‚Äôt cause outrage.‚Äù ID: 10302240 8. Now, in the first trailer for Urban Myths , we finally get to see what this all looks like. And I am sorry. View this image ‚Ä∫
